text: Mu vy’ukuri bamwe bagurisha amasezerano y’Imana hamwe n’indahiro zabo kubera amaronko makeyi y’aha kw’Isi, abo bantu nibo ataco bazoba bafise na gitoyi c’imigisha yo mw’Ijuru, kandi Imana ntizovugana nabo canke ibarabe k’umusi w’imperuka kandi ntizoba sukura nabo bazoronka ibihano bibabaza cane
